title: E-commerce API Documentation
description:
Dynamic E-Commerce Workflow Management. The system features dynamic routes for order processing, real-time inventory updates, and secure user authentication. It also supports seamless automated order reporting and comprehensive product management.
 Documented Backend API published publicly using Postman.

title: Course Booking API Documentation
description: RESTful API for managing course enrollments, featuring user registration, authentication, and retrieval of user details. Supports course creation, updates, archiving, activation, and student enrollment. Publicly documented using Postman.

title: Course booking App
description: A MERN-stack course enrollment system featuring user registration, authentication, and profile management. Authenticated users can create, update, archive, and activate courses. The platform also allows users to browse available courses and enroll seamlessly.

title: E-commerce App
description: MERN E-Commerce Platform. The platform features dynamic product catalog with filtering and sorting, real-time search, seamless cart updates, secure checkout, and a comprehensive admin dashboard with real-time analytics and user management capabilities.

title: Job Tracker API
description: The Job Tracker API provides a comprehensive set of endpoints to manage and monitor job applications efficiently. This API allows developers and users to create, update, retrieve, and delete job application records, track their statuses, and organize job search activities in a streamlined manner.

title: Job Tracker Client Demo
description: The Job Tracker App Client Demo showcases an intuitive and user-friendly interface designed to help job seekers efficiently manage their job applications in one centralized platform. This demo provides a hands-on experience of the core features and workflows available in the full application.

title: Blog App API
description: The Blog App API offers a robust and flexible backend service to manage blog content efficiently. It enables developers to create, retrieve, update, and delete blog posts, manage user comments, and handle user authentication seamlessly.

title: Blog App Client Demo
description: The Blog App Client Demo provides an interactive preview of a modern blogging platform’s frontend interface, designed for both readers and content creators. This demo highlights the app’s usability, design, and core features.

title: Static HTML Coffee Roasters Page
description: TThe Coffee Roasters Page is a beautifully designed web page dedicated to showcasing a coffee roasting business. It highlights the company’s story, roasting process, product offerings, and commitment to quality, providing visitors with an engaging and informative experience.
